verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣סֶף <WH3254> again אִ֭יּוֹב <WH347> Moreover Job שְׂאֵ֥ת <WH5375> took מְשָׁל֗וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

מִֽי־ <WH4310> Oh יִתְּנֵ֥נִי <WH5414> Oh that כְיַרְחֵי־ <WH3391> I were as [in] months קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> past כִּ֝ימֵ֗י <WH3117> as [in] the days אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> [when] God יִשְׁמְרֵֽנִי׃ <WH8104> preserved

בְּהִלּ֣וֹ <WH1984> shined נֵ֭רוֹ <WH5216> When his candle עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> over רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> upon my head לְ֝אוֹרוֹ <WH216> [and when] by his light אֵ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> walked חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> [through] darkness

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after הָ֭יִיתִי <WH1961> become בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> As I was in the days חָרְפִּ֑י <WH2779> of my youth בְּס֥וֹד <WH5475> when the secret אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַּ <WH433> of God עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> over אָהֳלִֽי׃ <WH168> [was] upon my tabernacle
בְּע֣וֹד <WH5750> was yet שַׁ֭דַּי <WH7706> When the Almighty עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> against סְבִ֖יבוֹתַ֣י <WH5439> [were] about נְעָרָֽי׃ <WH5288> [was] yet with me [when] my children

בִּרְחֹ֣ץ <WH7364> When I washed הֲלִיכַ֣י <WH1978> my steps בְּחֵמָ֑ה <WH2529> with butter וְצ֥וּר <WH6697> and the rock יָצ֥וּק <WH6694> poured me out עִ֝מָּדִ֗י <WH5978> me פַּלְגֵי־ <WH6388> rivers שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> of oil

בְּצֵ֣אתִי <WH3318> When I went out שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> to the gate עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> of קָ֑רֶת <WH7176> through the city בָּ֝רְח֗וֹב <WH7339> in the street אָכִ֥ין <WH3559> [when] I prepared מוֹשָׁבִֽי׃ <WH4186> my seat
רָא֣וּנִי <WH7200> saw נְעָרִ֣ים <WH5288> The young men וְנֶחְבָּ֑אוּ <WH2244> me and hid וִֽ֝ישִׁישִׁים <WH3453> themselves and the aged קָ֣מוּ <WH6965> arose עָמָֽדוּ׃ <WH5975> [and] stood up
שָׂ֭רִים <WH8269> The princes עָצְר֣וּ <WH6113> refrained בְמִלִּ֑ים <WH4405> talking וְ֝כַ֗ף <WH3709> [their] hand יָשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and laid לְפִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> on their mouth
קוֹל־ <WH6963> their peace נְגִידִ֥ים <WH5057> The nobles נֶחְבָּ֑אוּ <WH2244> held וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> and their tongue לְחִכָּ֥ם <WH2441> to the roof of their mouth דָּבֵֽקָה׃ <WH1692> cleaved

כִּ֤י <WH3588> when אֹ֣זֶן <WH241> When the ear שָׁ֭מְעָה <WH8085> heard וַֽתְּאַשְּׁרֵ֑נִי <WH833> [me] then it blessed וְעַ֥יִן <WH5869> me and when the eye רָ֝אֲתָ֗ה <WH7200> saw וַתְּעִידֵֽנִי׃ <WH5749> [me] it gave witness

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אֲ֭מַלֵּט <WH4422> Because I delivered עָנִ֣י <WH6041> the poor מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <WH7768> that cried וְ֝יָת֗וֹם <WH3490> and the fatherless וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> had no עֹזֵ֥ר <WH5826> and [him that had] none to help לֽוֹ׃

בִּרְכַּ֣ת <WH1293> The blessing אֹ֭בֵד <WH6> of him that was ready to perish עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and תָּבֹ֑א <WH935> came וְלֵ֖ב <WH3820> heart אַלְמָנָ֣ה <WH490> upon me and I caused the widow's אַרְנִֽן׃ <WH7442> to sing for joy

צֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> on righteousness לָ֭בַשְׁתִּי <WH3847> I put וַיִּלְבָּשֵׁ֑נִי <WH3847> and it clothed כִּמְעִ֥יל <WH4598> [was] as a robe וְ֝צָנִ֗יף <WH6797> and a diadem מִשְׁפָּטִֽי׃ <WH4941> me my judgment
עֵינַ֣יִם <WH5869> I was eyes הָ֭יִיתִי <WH1961> become לַֽעִוֵּ֑ר <WH5787> to the blind וְרַגְלַ֖יִם <WH7272> and feet לַפִּסֵּ֣חַ <WH6455> [was] I to the lame אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

אָ֣ב <WH1> I [was] a father אָ֭נֹכִֽי <WH595> I לָֽאֶבְיוֹנִ֑ים <WH34> to the poor וְרִ֖ב <WH7379> and the cause לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> [which] I knew אֶחְקְרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2713> not I searched out

וָֽ֭אֲשַׁבְּרָה <WH7665> And I brake מְתַלְּע֣וֹת <WH4973> the jaws עַוָּ֑ל <WH5767> of the wicked וּ֝מִשִּׁנָּ֗יו <WH8127> out of his teeth אַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> and plucked טָֽרֶף׃ <WH2964> the spoil

וָ֭אֹמַר <WH559> Then I said עִם־ <WH5973> in קִנִּ֣י <WH7064> in my nest אֶגְוָ֑ע <WH1478> I shall die וְ֝כַח֗וֹל <WH2344> as the sand אַרְבֶּ֥ה <WH7235> and I shall multiply יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> [my] days

שָׁרְשִׁ֣י <WH8328> My root פָת֣וּחַ <WH6605> [was] spread out אֱלֵי־ <WH413> to מָ֑יִם <WH4325> by the waters וְ֝טַ֗ל <WH2919> and the dew יָלִ֥ין <WH3885> lay all night בִּקְצִירִֽי׃ <WH7105> upon my branch
כְּ֭בוֹדִי <WH3519> My glory חָדָ֣שׁ <WH2319> [was] fresh עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> in me וְ֝קַשְׁתִּ֗י <WH7198> and my bow בְּיָדִ֥י <WH3027> in my hand תַחֲלִֽיף׃ <WH2498> was renewed
לִֽי־ שָׁמְע֥וּ <WH8085> Unto me [men] gave ear וְיִחֵ֑לּוּ <WH3176> and waited וְ֝יִדְּמ֗וּ <WH1826> and kept silence לְמ֣וֹ <WH3926> at עֲצָתִֽי׃ <WH6098> my counsel
אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> After דְ֭בָרִי <WH1697> my words לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יִשְׁנ֑וּ <WH8138> they spake not again וְ֝עָלֵ֗ימוֹ <WH5921> and תִּטֹּ֥ף <WH5197> dropped מִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH4405> and my speech

וְיִֽחֲל֣וּ <WH3176> And they waited כַמָּטָ֣ר <WH4306> for me as for the rain לִ֑י וּ֝פִיהֶ֗ם <WH6310> their mouth פָּעֲר֥וּ <WH6473> and they opened לְמַלְקֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH4456> wide [as] for the latter rain

אֶשְׂחַ֣ק <WH7832> [If] I laughed אֲ֭לֵהֶם <WH413> about לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יַאֲמִ֑ינוּ <WH539> on them they believed וְא֥וֹר <WH216> [it] not and the light פָּ֝נַ֗י <WH6440> of my countenance לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יַפִּילֽוּן׃ <WH5307> they cast not down

אֶֽבֲחַ֣ר <WH977> I chose דַּרְכָּם֮ <WH1870> out their way וְאֵשֵׁ֪ב <WH3427> and sat רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> chief וְ֭אֶשְׁכּוֹן <WH7931> and dwelt כְּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> as a king בַּגְּד֑וּד <WH1416> in the army כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after אֲבֵלִ֣ים <WH57> the mourners יְנַחֵֽם׃ <WH5162> as one [that] comforteth
